values: 画；绘制；描画；描绘；拉；拖；拽；吸引；产生；牵引；引起；激起（反应、回应）；使说出；提取；抽取；取出；抽；排出；导致；招致；作（比较或对比）；打成平手；移动；行进；（船）吃水；（帆）鼓起；（茶）被泡开
抽签；抽奖；平局；和局；不分胜负；吸引力；有吸引力的人（或事物）；拔枪动作；（高尔夫）偏球

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指将人或物朝出力者的方向拖，不涉及力的大小，含平稳意味，常作借喻用。
特指用绳子或链条等拖或拉本身无动力或无法使用自身动力的东西。
最普通用词，包含本组其它各词的一些意思，可指朝各个方向拉，侧重一时或突然拉动的动作。
指沿斜坡而上或水平方向缓慢地拖或拉十分沉重的人或物。作借喻时可指把人硬拉扯过来。
指用力拖或拉，不涉及方向，多作航海用词。
多指一阵阵地用力拖或拉，但不一定使被拉的人或物移动。

word_group.brief_definition: 得出诊断结论；做结论；得出结论
汲取, 借鉴, 利用
吸引注意力；提请注意；提请关注
渐短；渐黑；接近黄昏；渐长；天黑得早
后退, 远离, 退缩；拉开(窗帘)
无回音, 无结果, 无收获
对…加以限制；对…加以拒绝

bilingual.source: Tell them to draw a picture of themselves.
bilingual.target: 告诉他们画一张自己的画。

bilingual.source: Robin would like to draw a picture of the park.
bilingual.target: 罗宾想画一幅公园的画。

bilingual.source: I'm going to draw some pictures. What about you?

list.abstract: Draw（英[drɔː]，美[drɔː]），英语单词，作动词为绘制；勾画；画，作名词为抽签；平局；不分胜负的比赛；有吸引力的人。短语搭配有draw from（借鉴）。例句为“Forbid him to draw in his workbook.（禁止他在练习册上画画。）” 该单词的第三人称单数为draws，现在分词为drawing，过去式为drew，过去分词为drawn。

yingyinNormal.en: I have got to learn how to draw.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我真该学学怎么画画。

yingyinNormal.en: Can we draw with your coloring pens? Good idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们可以用彩色笔来画画吗？好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: Daddy, can we draw with your coloring pens? Good idea.
yingyinNormal.zh: 爸爸，我们可以用彩色笔来画画吗？好主意。

yingyinNormal.en: Wow, thanks everyone. You can draw on my plaster, too. Okay, I will draw a little flower.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哇，谢谢你们大家。你也可以在我的创可贴上画画。好的，我来画一朵小花。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, mom, you, too? Yeah, I'm with him. Draw a face on her.
yingyinNormal.zh: 妈妈，你也要来吗？是的，我和他一伙的。画张脸。

yingyinNormal.en: Lot of big talk from a man who can't draw a chocolate chip cookie.
yingyinNormal.zh: 巧克力豆饼干都画不好的人还敢在此大放厥词。

yingyinNormal.en: If you don't have brows, whatever, just draw the main and you got just make it work.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你没有眉毛，随便啦，就把他们画出来就好了。

yingyinNormal.en: Moving on to brows, unfortunately I was not blessed with strong brows, so I'm just gonna draw them in.
yingyinNormal.zh: 继续眉毛的部分，很可惜，我眉毛不多，所以我要画出眉毛。

yingyinNormal.en: Jack, I want you to draw me like one of your French girls. Wearing this. All right. Wearing only this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 杰克，也替我画一幅画，我要戴着这个。好啊。我只要戴着这个。

yingyinNormal.en: I grazed my knee and I got a plaster too. Wow, do you want to draw on my plaster cast? Yes, please.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我摔破了我的膝盖，我这里还贴了张创可贴呢。哇，你们想要画画吗？可以画在我的石膏上。是的，我想。

yingyinNormal.en: Don't try to draw that line. You will not just get it wrong. You'll miss big opportunities and I mean big, like the Internet.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不要尝试画这样的直线，这不仅会出错，还会错失大机遇。我说的是大机遇，例如像互联网这样。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《Facebook COO谢丽尔·桑德伯格哈佛演讲》

yingyinNormal.en: Do you draw? No, not at all. Your sisters, do they draw? Not one.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你会绘画吗？不，一点都不会。你的姐妹呢？她们会绘画吗？没有一个会。

yingyinNormal.en: If we draw a line from the bottom of the San Andreas up to the Hoover dam, it almost literally follows the Colorado river, which is a natural deformation event.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我们画一条线，从圣安德烈亚斯底部直通到胡佛大坝，可以发现这条线几乎是沿着科罗拉多河的，而那条河流是自然变形造成的。

yingyinNormal.en: You take the pictures too. I do. How'd you guess that? I draw pictures. Yeah? Yeah.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你也会拍照。没错，你怎么知道的？我会画画。是吗？是的。

yingyinNormal.en: That should draw them back to the beach.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这样他们就会占领沙滩。

yingyinNormal.en: Throw a joke or aside in. It will draw laugh.
yingyinNormal.zh: 讲个笑话，聊点闲话，逗逗观众。
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Hey, what you doing, Quick Draw? Sorry. Go on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你这是干什么，三分钟先生？抱歉，您请说。

yingyinNormal.en: Tales of human interaction. We'll take it. Thanks, quick draw.
yingyinNormal.zh: 《人际交往故事集》。就要这本了，谢谢，真迅速。

yingyinNormal.en: That's just so we don't draw attention to the congressional race.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那只是为了不让国会竞选吸引太多注意。

yingyinNormal.en: You'd take Chumhum and get rid of us. No. We'd draw up a contract.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等你签回查查网后就会甩了我们。不会，我们可以起草一份合同。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 引起; 招来; 吸引
提取; 支取(钱); 领取(薪水)
山沟; 沟壑切断的路

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 抽屉；衬裤；内裤；画…的人；制图员；开票人；出票人
n. 图画；素描；图表；图样；绘画；制图

word_family.mean: v. 绘制；勾画；画；拉；拖；拔出；抽出；取出；排出；引出；引起；吸引；激起；以平局结束；使（球）朝预定的目标作弧线运动；（船）吃水；（帆）吃饱风

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 吸引注意力；提请注意；提请关注
(昼)渐短；(天)渐黑；接近黄昏；(夜)渐长；天黑得早

sense_info_list.en: bring out by way of response
sense_info_list.zh: 引起; 招来; 吸引

examination_example.sentence: Perhaps, as the team suggests, it <highlight>draws</highlight> us to similar environments but there is more to it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 也许，正如该团队所表明的那样，它令我们被相似的环境所吸引，但又不止如此。

examination_example.sentence: They want to use their wealth to <highlight>draw</highlight> attention to those who have succeeded in science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们想用他们的财富，来吸引人们注意那些在科学上取得成功的人。

examination_example.sentence: Some want to shock, others to <highlight>draw</highlight> people into science, or to better reward those who have made their careers in research.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人想要博人眼球，另一些人则想要吸引人们进入科学界，或是想更好地奖励那些在研究领域有所成就的人。

sense_info_list.en: produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper, especially with a pen or pencil

examination_example.sentence: Younger Americans are <highlight>drawing</highlight> a new 21st-century road map to success, a latest poll has found.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项最新民意调查发现，美国的年轻人正在绘制新的21世纪成功路线图。

examination_example.sentence: As so often is the case, stating that principle doesn't ease the challenge of line-<highlight>drawing</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常情况下，说明该原则并不能缓解划清界限的挑战。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Draw</highlight> pictures of genes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 绘制基因图。

examination_example.sentence: Clearly you try to comprehend, <highlight>drawing</highlight> on your implicit knowledge of English grammar.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 很显然，你在利用自己内在的英语语法知识，尝试着去理解。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Draw</highlight> on our experience from the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 借鉴我们过去的经验。

sense_info_list.zh: 提取; 支取(钱); 领取(薪水)

examination_example.sentence: At work, people know what they're supposed to be doing: working, making money, doing the tasks in order to <highlight>draw</highlight> an income.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在工作中，人们知道他们该做什么：工作、挣钱、完成任务以赚取收入。

examination_example.sentence: The bargain is very pure: Employee puts in hours of physical or mental labor and employee <highlight>draws</highlight> out life-sustaining moola.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这笔交易非常纯粹：员工投入数小时的体力或脑力劳动，然后领取维持生计的薪水。

sense_info_list.en: take or obtain liquid from a container or receptacle

examination_example.sentence: But the remaining trees <highlight>draw</highlight> a greater share of the available moisture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但剩余的树木吸收了更多的水分。

sense_info_list.en: extract an object from a container, receptacle, or others

examination_example.sentence: All the subjects were <highlight>drawn</highlight> from a population of European extraction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 所有受试者均选自欧洲血统人群。

sense_info_list.en: an act of selecting names randomly, typically by extracting them from a bag or other container, to match competitors in a game or tournament
move in a slow steady way
(of tea) be left standing so that the flavor is extracted from the leaves
bring in or gather from a specified group or area
(of a ship) require a specified depth of water to float in; have a certain draft
hit (the ball) so that it travels slightly to the left (for a left-handed player, the right), usually as a result of spin given to the ball
formulate or perceive a comparison or distinction
come to or arrive at a point in time or a specified point in a process
reach a conclusion by deduction or inference from a set of circumstances
pull or drag something such as a vehicle so as to make it follow behind
a game or contest that ends with the score even;
a gully that is shallower than a ravine
sense_info_list.zh: 山沟; 沟壑切断的路

sense_info_list.en: a person or thing that is very attractive or interesting

word_usage.usage: draw在表示绘画时，指的是用铅笔、钢笔等进行作画，如果是用颜料的话，要用paint。
为某人画某物可以直接用draw sb. sth.，也可以用介词for来表达：draw sth. for sb.。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 具有吸引力的人/物; 吸引

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 抽屉；衬裤；内裤；画…的人；制图员；开票人；出票人
n. 图画；素描；图表；图样；绘画；制图

word_family.mean: v. 绘制；勾画；画；拉；拖；拔出；抽出；取出；排出；引出；引起；吸引；激起；以平局结束；使（球）朝预定的目标作弧线运动；（船）吃水；（帆）吃饱风

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 得出诊断结论；做结论；得出结论

sense_info_list.en: produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper, especially with a pen or pencil

examination_example.sentence: A new study has <highlight>drawn</highlight> a bleak picture of cultural inclusiveness reflected in the children's literature available in Australia.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新的研究描绘了澳大利亚儿童文学作品中反映的文化包容性的惨淡图景。

examination_example.sentence: Everybody is born with the capacity to <highlight>draw</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个人生来都有绘画的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Human beings have been <highlight>drawing</highlight> for 73,000 years.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类绘画已有73000年的历史。

sense_info_list.en: a person or thing that is very attractive or interesting
sense_info_list.zh: 具有吸引力的人/物; 吸引

examination_example.sentence: We are <highlight>drawn</highlight> to our pets because pets do not lie.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们被宠物吸引，因为宠物不会撒谎。

examination_example.sentence: Did the children who were <highlight>drawn</highlight> to music perhaps have something in them from the start?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 被音乐吸引的孩子可能从一开始就有某种特质吗？

sense_info_list.en: bring out by way of response

examination_example.sentence: It also <highlight>drew</highlight> sharp criticism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也招致了尖锐的批评。

sense_info_list.en: reach a conclusion by deduction or inference from a set of circumstances

examination_example.sentence: What conclusion could be <highlight>drawn</highlight> from the study in Germany?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从德国的研究中可以得出什么结论？

sense_info_list.en: obtain or withdraw money from a bank or other source
extract an object from a container, receptacle, or others
take or obtain liquid from a container or receptacle
pull or drag something such as a vehicle so as to make it follow behind

exam_freq_info.chinese: 具有吸引力的人/物; 吸引

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 抽屉；衬裤；内裤；画…的人；制图员；开票人；出票人
n. 图画；素描；图表；图样；绘画；制图

word_family.mean: v. 绘制；勾画；画；拉；拖；拔出；抽出；取出；排出；引出；引起；吸引；激起；以平局结束；使（球）朝预定的目标作弧线运动；（船）吃水；（帆）吃饱风

sense_info_list.en: produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper; especially with a pen or pencil

examination_example.sentence: A 9-year-old boy named Joe, told not to <highlight>draw</highlight> in class, wins a job decorating a restaurant with his drawings.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个叫乔的9岁男孩被告知不要在课堂上画画，他用自己的画赢得了一份装饰餐厅的工作。

examination_example.sentence: Forbid him to <highlight>draw</highlight> in his workbook.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 禁止他在练习册上画画。

sense_info_list.en: reach a conclusion by deduction or inference from a set of circumstances

examination_example.sentence: A conclusion has been <highlight>drawn</highlight> from many experiments that anumeric people have a hard time distinguishing quantities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从许多实验中得出的结论是：不懂数字的人很难区分数量。

examination_example.sentence: Robots could also learn values from <highlight>drawing</highlight> patterns from large sets of data on human behavior.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人还可以通过绘制人类行为的大型数据集的模式来学习价值。

examination_example.sentence: The Department of Public Health in Boston gathers and carefully examines the figures and then <highlight>draws</highlight> its conclusions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 波士顿公共卫生部收集了这些数据并仔细核验，然后得出结论。

sense_info_list.en: bring in or gather from a specified group or area
a person or thing that is very attractive or interesting
sense_info_list.zh: 具有吸引力的人/物; 吸引

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Drawing</highlight> in adventure seekers and experienced divers, this new artificial Airbus reef will be a scuba diver's paradise (天堂) .
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这个新的人工空客珊瑚礁将吸引探险爱好者和经验丰富的潜泳者，它将成为潜泳者的天堂。

sense_info_list.en: bring out by way of response

examination_example.sentence: Each artist has their own individual style but all artists share a common aim: to <highlight>draw</highlight> attention to the pollution in our cities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每位艺术家都有自己的风格，但所有艺术家都有一个共同的目标：引起人们对城市污染的关注。

examination_example.sentence: It usually <highlight>draws</highlight> different reactions from different age groups.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它通常会引起不同年龄组的不同反应。

sense_info_list.en: to take or obtain something from a particular source

examination_example.sentence: Creating majors that <highlight>drew</highlight> from only one of those areas.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只选择这些领域中的一个来创建专业。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Draw</highlight> up a list of the efficiencies to be promised.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 拟定一份承诺的效率清单。

sense_info_list.en: obtain or withdraw money from a bank or other source
take or obtain liquid from a container or receptacle
an act of selecting names randomly; typically by extracting them from a bag or other container; to match competitors in a game or tournament
extract an object from a container; receptacle; or others
a game or contest that ends with the score even;

exam_freq_info.chinese: 引起; 招引; 吸引

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 抽屉；衬裤；内裤；画…的人；制图员；开票人；出票人
n. 图画；素描；图表；图样；绘画；制图

word_family.mean: v. 绘制；勾画；画；拉；拖；拔出；抽出；取出；排出；引出；引起；吸引；激起；以平局结束；使（球）朝预定的目标作弧线运动；（船）吃水；（帆）吃饱风

sense_info_list.zh: 引起; 招引; 吸引

examination_example.sentence: The problem may be that we can't stop ourselves from getting <highlight>drawn</highlight> into others' conversations.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题可能在于，我们无法阻止自己被别人的谈话所吸引。

examination_example.sentence: Scott's last journey caught the world's imagination, and a film made in his honor <highlight>drew</highlight> crowds.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Scott的最后一次旅程吸引了全世界的目光，一部以他的名字命名的电影吸引了大批观众。

examination_example.sentence: The exhibition shows how Dali <highlight>draws</highlight> the viewer between two infinities (无限).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 展览展示了达利如何将观众引向两个无限之间。

examination_example.sentence: Most of Anneke's students start out thinking they're not creative and can't <highlight>draw</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 安妮克的大多数学生一开始都认为自己没有创造力，不会画画。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Draw</highlight> a picture.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 画一幅画。

examination_example.sentence: By <highlight>drawing</highlight> inspirations from classic novels.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 从经典小说中汲取灵感。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 引起; 招来; 吸引

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 抽屉；衬裤；内裤；画…的人；制图员；开票人；出票人
n. 图画；素描；图表；图样；绘画；制图

word_family.mean: v. 绘制；勾画；画；拉；拖；拔出；抽出；取出；排出；引出；引起；吸引；激起；以平局结束；使（球）朝预定的目标作弧线运动；（船）吃水；（帆）吃饱风

sense_info_list.en: produce a picture or diagram by making lines and marks on paper, especially with a pen or pencil

examination_example.sentence: Lucy is getting to be an old hand at <highlight>drawing</highlight> pictures.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 露西逐渐成为一名绘画老手。

examination_example.sentence: Tony was <highlight>drawing</highlight> a picture while I was doing my homework.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当我做作业的时候，托尼正在画一幅画。

examination_example.sentence: When did Alexandra begin <highlight>drawing</highlight> pictures?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 亚历山德拉是从什么时候开始画画的？

sense_info_list.en: bring out by way of response
sense_info_list.zh: 引起; 招来; 吸引

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>draw</highlight> Terry B's attention.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 引起Terry B的注意。

examination_example.sentence: In South Africa, the situation of cycads is getting terrible, but this has <highlight>drawn</highlight> little attention from the public.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在南非，苏铁的情况越来越糟糕，但这并没有引起公众的注意。

examination_example.sentence: The first paragraph is mainly to <highlight>draw</highlight> reader's attention to dandelions.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 第一段主要是为了引起读者对蒲公英的注意。

sense_info_list.en: reach a conclusion by deduction or inference from a set of circumstances

examination_example.sentence: What conclusion (结论) can we <highlight>draw</highlight> from their opinions?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们可以从他们的意见中得出什么结论？

sense_info_list.en: take or obtain liquid from a container or receptacle

examination_example.sentence: Then the donors relax, often reading a magazine or talking as their blood is <highlight>drawn</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后献血者放松下来；抽血的时候，他们通常在看杂志或者聊天。

sense_info_list.en: pull or drag something such as a vehicle so as to make it follow behind
obtain or withdraw money from a bank or other source

word_usage.usage: draw在表示绘画时，指的是用铅笔、钢笔等进行作画，如果是用颜料的话，要用paint。
为某人画某物可以直接用draw sb. sth.，也可以用介词for来表达：draw sth. for sb。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指将人或物朝出力者的方向拖，不涉及力的大小，含平稳意味，常作借喻用。
最普通用词，可指朝各个方向拉，侧重一时或突然拉动的动作。
